WorkItem.Description:
Hello,


VRplayer 32bits doesn't work with VLC 64bits on Win64. 
It's a path problems. VRplayer can't find VLC path.

So, we can install VLC32 on Win64. It's work... but.. very slowly. 
Do you have an 64bits version of VRplayer ?


I'll try to compile a 64bits version of the player. 
Do you think that adapatations are needed?




a++
Numael
